isEmail: Field "{property}" must be a valid email address
isBoolean: Field "{property}" must be a boolean value
isUUID: Field "{property}" must be a valid UUID
minLength: Field "{property}" must be at least {constraint1} characters
maxLength: Field "{property}" must be no more than {constraint1} characters
min: Field "{property}" must not be less than {constraint1}
max: Field "{property}" must not be greater than {constraint1}
isEnum: Field "{property}" must be a valid enum value
isNotIn: Field "{property}" must not be one of: {constraint1}
isPositive: Field "{property}" must be a positive number
isNegative: Field "{property}" must be a negative number
minDate: Field "{property}" must not be earlier than {constraint1}
maxDate: Field "{property}" must not be later than {constraint1}
